metadata.title: CVE-2022-27777 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: A XSS Vulnerability in Action View tag helpers >= 5.2.0 and < 5.2.0 which would allow an attacker to inject content if able to control input into specific attributes.

notes.note: seth-arnold> In Oneiric-Saucy, rails package is just for transition; The rails package contains actual code from vivid onward

criterions.comment: rails package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
